definitions.definition: To schedule again or at a different time.
examples: We'll have to reschedule next Monday's meeting because of the public holiday.

definitions.definition: To reclassify ; to change the schedule (division into which something is classified) of.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To schedule again or at a different time.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , US , law ) To reclassify ; to change the schedule (division into which something is classified) of.
